Where can I find more information about the Verus ecosystem, such as block explorers, social media channels, and mining resources?

You can find more information about the Verus ecosystem through various resources:

* Block explorer: [Explorer for all Komodo Ecosystem chains](https://dex.explorer.dexstats.info/)
* Social Media: [Bitcointalk](https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4070404.0), [Discord](https://verus.io/discord), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/veruscoin), [Medium](https://medium.com/@veruscoin), and [Reddit](https://reddit.com/r/veruscoin)
* Mining resources: [Chain specifications](https://cdn-images-1.medium.com/max/2000/1*GUXCVTqV455RoOQzj9FGSw.jpeg), [Miner downloads](https://github.com/monkins1010/ccminer/releases) and [nheqminer](https://github.com/VerusCoin/nheqminer/releases), [Mining pool list](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1RrSYJDV0Mjj3X-myMC3aQDGkcipivxHsD7ZxJ3r5f_A/edit#gid=201266774), and a [Guide to mining in under 5 minutes](https://medium.com/veruscoin/how-to-start-cpu-mining-verus-coin-vrsc-from-your-laptop-in-under-5-minutes-f69c9aae340e)

ervices/)
